title: Once Upon A Toy
blurb: Step into a world where toys become storytellers.
description: Step into a world where toys become storytellers of childhood dreams with Alliance Francaise and MINT Museum of Toys ' new exhibition, Imaginaire: Of Small Memories and Greater Dreams . Join a captivating exhibition that invites visitors to rediscover the world of French childhood through the toys that shaped it across the 20th century. In collaboration with the MINT Museum of Toys, this unique exhibition offers a chronological exploration of how toys reflect the shifting hopes, values, and fantasies of growing up in a changing world. From intricate mechanical creations of the early 1900s to mass-produced plastic icons of the post-war boom, IMAGINAIRE showcases how imagination, innovation, and marketing together transformed toys into powerful vessels of identity, escapism, and creativity. The exhibition is structured around three evolving themes that define the way children dream: Escape from reality : toys that transport children to faraway lands, magical circuses, or even outer space Connection and companionship : plush animals, dolls, and board games that reflect the emotional and social world of play Becoming your own hero : objects that let children see themselves as stars, explorers, or champions of their own story More than just a nostalgic journey, IMAGINAIRE is a cultural reflection on how play helps shape who we are as individuals and societies.

title: Colugo Camp
blurb: Immerse yourself in the wild with our all-inclusive experience.
description: Stay at Colugo Camp, where your journey comes with everything — accommodation, dining, guided tours and unforgettable wildlife encounters. This all-inclusive Roar & Rest experience at the Mandai Wildlife Reserve offers a unique opportunity to connect with nature and wildlife. Enjoy comfortable accommodations, delicious meals, and exclusive guided tours that bring you up close to amazing animals. Perfect for families and nature enthusiasts seeking an immersive and memorable adventure.
datetime_display: Camp dates available up till 29 March 2026
Keyword_tag: Wildlife, Accommodation, Guided Tours, Nature, Adventure, mandai, zoo

title: Long Kuan Hung Crocodile Farm
blurb: Posts About Reels Photos More Posts About Reels Photos
description: Long Kuan Hung Crocodile Farm is a unique attraction where visitors can observe crocodiles of various sizes and ages in a farm setting. The farm provides an opportunity to learn about these reptiles and their habitat. It's an educational experience suitable for families and individuals interested in wildlife and conservation. The farm showcases different aspects of crocodile farming, from breeding to the utilization of crocodile products. Visitors can explore the enclosures and gain insights into the life cycle and behavior of these fascinating creatures. It is a family-friendly destination that offers a glimpse into the world of crocodiles.
price_display: $22 per pax. Free for child below 3 years old
Keyword_tag: Crocodile, farm , wildlife, reptiles, animal , tour

title: A Whale of a Tale at National Museum
blurb: Customised playground inspired by blue whale skeleton.
description: A Whale of a Tale is a customised playground inspired by the iconic blue whale skeleton once displayed at the National Museum of Singapore. This installation was built in collaboration with SPACELogic, blending artistry, storytelling, and safe play design into a remarkable interactive experience. The majestic Whale Structure, crafted from Glass Fibre Reinforced Concrete (GFRC) and equipped with a wide variety of play equipment that encourages exploration, imagination, and physical activity. Children can tunnel through the underside of the whale’s head or climb up using ladders, scale across the cargo net blowhole, and descend the slide that exits through the whale’s mouth. Mosaic tiles embellish the whale’s head and tail, while climbing grips—designed to resemble barnacles—offer tactile and visual appeal. Behind the head, interactive Galopin play panels and a steering wheel ignite imaginative adventures. The skeletal body of the whale offers additional fun elements such as swing seats, a spring seat, and a cargo net, promoting balance and coordination. Between the whale’s body and tail, children can navigate a series of balance beams and play mounds that test their agility. Music and movement intertwine through Percussion Play instruments, where children can experiment with rhythm by spinning the Cyclone—mimicking the gentle sound of rain—or striking the Djembe to produce varying tones. The Berliner Disk, tilted for dynamic spinning, enhances coordination and spatial awareness as children learn to balance through motion. Surrounding Outerspace outdoor picnic furniture set provides a welcoming area for rest and social connection.

title: Science Centre Singapore Prehistoric Exhibition
blurb: Explore prehistoric giants and mass extinctions!
description: Embark on an extraordinary journey through 400 million years of Earth’s history at Science Centre Singapore. This bold new exhibition features the awe-inspiring Patagotitan mayorum, a true titan of the dinosaur world. Stand beneath a colossal 40-metre dinosaur cast and feel dwarfed by its prehistoric majesty. The Lee Kong Chian Natural History Museum of the National University of Singapore are bringing together two world-renowned exhibitions— Dinosaurs of Patagonia and Six Extinctions — for the first time. With 33 rare fossils and 60 full-scale models, this largest ever dinosaur showcase will unfold across three interactive zones, to reveal the dramatic rise and fall of prehistoric life and the five major mass extinction events that have shaped our planet.
Keyword_tag: Dinosaurs, Extinctions, Prehistoric, Fossils, Science, Museum, Exhibition,

title: MINT Museum of Toys Guided Tours in Singapore
blurb: Dive into stories behind vintage toy collections!
description: Explore the MINT Museum of Toys with our guided tours in Singapore. Discover vintage toys, collectibles, and memorabilia reflecting international cultural trends and historical events. Our trained docents will take you through the museum, offering insights into the collection. Learn about the museum's history, the cultural significance of selected toys, and their design value across different eras. Visitors of all ages are welcome to reminisce about their childhoods. Pre-book your admission tickets for the guided tour to guarantee your entry. Admittance subject to existing safety requirements.
price_display: Guided tours from $30 - $33 per pax (Free for child below 7 years old)
Keyword_tag: vintage, toys, collectibles, museum, tours, cultural, historical

title: Pony and Horse Rides at Gallop Stable Pasir Ris Park
blurb: Enjoy pony rides for kids and horse rides for adults.
description: Gallop Stable @ Pasir Ris Park offers pony rides for children aged 3 and above. Providing a safe and thrilling horseback riding experience. Horse rides for adults are also available. Rides are fully supervised by trained staff, and helmets are provided. Pony and horse rides are available from Tuesdays to Sundays. Weekday sessions are from 10 am to 12 pm and 2 pm to 7 pm. Weekend sessions are from 8 am to 12 pm and 2 pm to 7 pm. Please note that rides are not available during wet weather or extreme heat.

Explore the diverse plant life and enjoy the cool, misty environment. Perfect for families and nature enthusiasts, Cloud Forest provides an educational and visually stunning adventure. A must-visit destination for all ages, the OCBC Skyway provides a captivating perspective of the surrounding landscape. Capture memorable moments and create lasting memories in this iconic attraction.

title: Garden Rhapsody
blurb: Explore Supertrees, waterfall, and cooled conservatories.
description: Experience the dazzling nightly spectacle of Garden Rhapsody at Gardens by the Bay—a magical light and sound show nestled in the iconic Supertree Grove. As dusk settles, towering “trees” burst into life with choreographed LED sequences synced to a vibrant musical soundtrack, creating a mesmerising outdoor performance. Ideal for families and visitors alike, Garden Rhapsody combines nature-inspired architecture with high-tech flair in a setting that’s easy to access and perfect to unwind in. Bring a mat, arrive early for a great viewing spot, and settle in to watch the garden transform into a dazzling wonderland of light, sound and shared delight.

title: Dragonfly & Kingfisher Lakes

description: Refresh your day with a sparkling river walk. As you admire the aquatic life in and around the lake, dive deeper to discover the marvellous ecosystem thriving right within. Explore the diverse flora and fauna that call these lakes home. Perfect for nature lovers and families seeking a peaceful escape. Discover the beauty of aquatic ecosystems and enjoy a relaxing stroll along the waterfront. Dragonfly & Kingfisher Lakes offer a unique opportunity to connect with nature and appreciate the wonders of biodiversity.

The Kingfisher Wetlands offer a glimpse into the rich biodiversity of Singapore's wetlands. Discover the wonders of nature and learn about the importance of conservation.

title: Supertree Grove
blurb: Home to 12 of the Gardens’ 18 iconic Supertrees.
description: The Supertree Grove is home to 12 of the Gardens’ 18 iconic Supertrees as well as the 128m-long OCBC Skyway. Catch the free Garden Rhapsody light-and-sound show nightly and see the Supertrees "dance" to the music! Experience the magic of this iconic attraction. Perfect for families and individuals seeking a memorable visual spectacle. The Supertree Grove offers a unique blend of nature and technology. Discover the beauty of these towering structures and enjoy the nightly light show.

title: The Canyon
blurb: World’s largest collection of sculptural rocks.
description: The Canyon features the world’s largest collection of sculptural rocks along a 400-metre trail inspired by the dragon. Explore this unique landscape and discover the beauty of natural rock formations. Perfect for nature lovers and those seeking a unique visual experience. The Canyon offers a fascinating glimpse into the world of geology and art. Discover the beauty of these sculptural rocks and enjoy a scenic walk along the trail.

title: World of Plants
blurb: Discover something new around every corner.
description: Discover something new around every corner at the World of Plants. Venture into this realm of voluptuous greenery and learn all about the spectacular myriad of tropical plants and the eco-systems they support. Explore the diverse flora of the tropics. Perfect for nature lovers and those seeking an immersive botanical experience. The World of Plants offers a fascinating glimpse into the world of tropical plants. Discover the beauty and diversity of these remarkable species.

title: Borealis
blurb: Enjoy fun under the sun for the whole family!
description: Step into magic at Borealis, an immersive light-and-sound installation set amidst the iconic Supertree Grove at Gardens by the Bay. Created by Swiss artist Dan Acher and accompanied by composer Guillaume Desbois, this ethereal spectacle uses layers of light, mist and music to evoke the awe of the Northern Lights in Singapore’s night sky. Each display is unique, shaped by subtle changes in wind, humidity and temperature—so no two visits feel the same. It’s free to attend (though Supertree access may require a ticket during major events). Gather family or friends, bring your sense of wonder, and gaze up as the trees transform into a glowing dreamscape of colour and sound.

title: Alice: Into the New World Media Art Spectacle
blurb: A surreal, breathtaking media art spectacle awaits you.
description: Step into a new adventure in a familiar world. After 150 years, the beloved classic has been reborn as a surreal, breathtaking media art spectacle. Experience it like never before. Alice: Into the New World in Singapore Following a successful run at GROUNDSEESAW Korea, an immersive journey into a world where reality and imagination collide is now coming to Singapore! Step into a five-sided screen environment where the beloved story is reborn through cutting-edge media art and an exclusive soundtrack by a top K-POP producer. Alice: Into the New World in Singapore Following a successful run at GROUNDSEESAW Korea, an immersive journey into a world where reality and imagination collide is now coming to Singapore! title: Junior Rockstars at The Gem Museum Singapore
blurb: Explore rocks and minerals with Junior Rockstars!
description: Junior Rockstars, a children's department at The Gem Museum Singapore, caters to children under 12 interested in rocks and minerals. The program aims to ignite passion in children by exploring gemstones. Over the years, many children have grown up with the museum, developing a lasting interest in the uniqueness of gems, rocks, and minerals. The Gem Museum considers these children their real gems and rockstars, fostering a learning environment where they can discover their dreams and passions through the wonders of gemstones and geological formations, with activities designed to be both educational and engaging.

title: Jurassic Mile: A Prehistoric Adventure Awaits
blurb: Step back in time and explore life-sized dinosaurs!
description: Embark on a thrilling journey through Jurassic Mile, where you'll encounter life-sized dinosaurs in their natural habitat. This outdoor attraction offers a unique blend of education and adventure, perfect for families and dinosaur enthusiasts of all ages. Stroll along the path and marvel at the realistic recreations of these prehistoric creatures, learning about their history and behavior along the way. The Jurassic Mile provides an engaging and immersive experience that will captivate children and adults alike, making it a must-visit destination for a fun-filled family outing. Discover the wonders of the past and create lasting memories as you explore this prehistoric wonderland.
Keyword_tag: Dinosaurs, outdoor, family, adventure, prehistoric, walking, trek

blurb: Adventure awaits at Cloud Forest! Welcome to Jurassic World!
description: Embark on an unforgettable journey at Jurassic World, nestled in the heart of Gardens by the Bay. Begin your adventure at Brachiosaurus Falls, where lush jungle paths lead you to a breathtaking waterfall. Encounter towering Brachiosaurus amidst the mist, offering a stunning welcome to a world where dinosaurs roam once again. Explore the wonders of prehistoric life in an immersive experience suitable for families and dinosaur enthusiasts of all ages. Discover the magic of Jurassic World and create lasting memories in this unique setting.

title: Trick-or-Treat Family Fun at National Gallery
blurb: Halloween family fun blending art with play!
description: This Halloween family programme blends art with play. Held in the Expression Workshop room at the Gallery’s Keppel Centre for Arts Education (KCAE), children will design their own “Monster-Builders" boxes before embarking on a trick-or-treat trail through selected exhibition spaces. With a playful map in hand, they’ll discover artworks and collect sweet surprises from Gallery staff along the way, ending with refreshments at Bakery Brera Café. The event is suitable for families and includes designing monster builder boxes and a trick or treat trail.

title: Singapore Odyssea: A Journey Through Time
blurb: Embark on a time-travelling voyage through Singapore!
description: Discover Singapore's 700-year history at Singapore Odyssea, a new signature experience within the Shaw Foundation Glass Rotunda. This multimedia showcase blends light, art, and interactive storytelling for an immersive experience. Pick up an RFID wristband to activate your magical companion, inspired by Singapore native wildlife, and let it guide you through stunning visuals, animated dioramas, and encounters with legendary creatures. Rediscover Singapore’s history and the importance of the sea, while engaging with environmental conservation and sustainability. Perfect for families and visitors of all ages.

title: Singapore History Gallery at National Museum
blurb: Discover Singapore's history from settlement to city.
description: Explore the comprehensive history of Singapore's evolution, from its early days as an ancient settlement to its transformation into a modern metropolis. Uncover the pivotal moments that shaped the nation, including its time as a Crown Colony, its resilience during war and occupation as Syonan-To, and its ultimate emergence as an independent and thriving Singapore. Delve into the stories and artifacts that bring Singapore's past to life, offering insights into the cultural, social, and political forces that have shaped its identity.

title: Once Upon a Tide: Singapore's Journey Exhibition
blurb: Explore Singapore's transformation from settlement to city.
description: Embark on a captivating journey through Singapore's rich maritime history and its evolution from a humble settlement to a global metropolis. This exhibition showcases the pivotal role of the sea in shaping Singapore's identity, economy, and culture. Discover fascinating artifacts, historical documents, and interactive displays that bring to life the stories of early settlers, maritime trade, and the nation's remarkable progress. Perfect for families and history enthusiasts, this exhibition offers an engaging and educational experience for all ages. Explore the exhibits and learn about Singapore's past.
Keyword_tag: history, maritime , culture, museum, exhibition, exhibit

The library aims to promote reading and lifelong learning within the community, providing a comfortable and accessible environment for everyone to explore and discover new knowledge.

description: Explore the wonders of marine life at the Singapore Oceanarium. Discover diverse ecosystems and fascinating sea creatures. title: Peranakan Museum: Exploring Culture and Heritage
blurb: Discover Peranakan culture through art and exhibitions.
description: The Peranakan Museum showcases the rich cultural heritage of the Peranakan community through a diverse collection of artifacts, textiles, and interactive exhibits. Visitors can explore the unique traditions, customs, and artistry of the Peranakan people, gaining insights into their history and cultural significance. The museum offers a family-friendly environment with engaging displays suitable for all ages. Explore the Peacock Power exhibition, showcasing beauty and symbolism across cultures. Daily guided tours are available to enhance your visit and provide deeper understanding of the exhibits. The museum aims to preserve and promote Peranakan culture for future generations.
price_display: Free entry for Singaporeans and PRs, $12 for standard rate
Keyword_tag: Peranakan, Museum, culture, heritage, exhibitions, art, traditions, customs, artistry, tours

title: Singapore Art Museum: Learning Gallery Exhibition
blurb: Explore contemporary art with a child's spirit.
description: Rekindle wonder and explore contemporary art with the uninhibited spirit of a child. Art and childhood share a natural connection, involving freedom, curiosity, and fearless exploration. This second edition of the Learning Gallery invites you to look beyond the everyday, experiment with different ideas and materials, and venture outside the familiar. The artworks span diverse mediums and explore themes of identity, home, nature, the environment, people, places, space, and memory. Discover new ways of seeing and understanding contemporary art.

title: Yakult Singapore Factory Tour for an Education
blurb: Educational tour of its state-of-the-art plant.
description: Since 1987, Yakult Singapore has welcomed visitors for an educational tour of its state-of-the-art plant. To date, more than 470,000 people have visited our plant, ranging from preschoolers (5 years old and above) to senior citizens from grassroots, community centers, private organisations, government bodies and educational institutions of all levels. The tour provides insights into the production process of Yakult and its health benefits, making it a family-friendly and educational experience for all ages.
datetime_display: Booking required. Non school holiday: 10am – 11.30am & 2pm – 3.30pm, School holiday: 9.30am – 11am & 11.30am – 1pm & 2pm – 3.30pm
